name: μ-Family — Local Weight / Micro-Adjacency
purpose: Introduce μ as the local metric-density operator generating weighted deviation, weighted projection, weighted evaluation, and micro-adjacency structure. μ enhances δ, Φ, Π and expands the Tri-Unity into a weighted 4D hypercube.
notes: μ introduces local geometric density, adjacency weighting, and micro-structure used throughout higher tiers.
